titleStmt.title: Islington wells a song of all the virtues of those old waters, newly found out: with all preparations that are making for young wives that have unkind husbands. To the tune of --- Come boys fill us a bumper.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J[ames]. Dean, bookseller in Cranborn Street near Newport-house in Leicester Fields,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Cranborn Street near Newport-house in Leicester Fields
